actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to reauthorize the United States Commission on Civil Rights, and for other purposes.
short_title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1989
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1989 - Amends the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to extend the Commission for six additional years (through November 30, 1995). Authorizes appropriations through FY 1995.

titles.title: United States Commission on Civil Rights Reauthorization Act of 1989
A bill to reauthorize the United States Commission on Civil Rights, and for other purposes.
